# The `WebAssemblyNullifyDebugValueLists.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Nullify DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LISTs instructions as a temporary measure before we implement DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST handling in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblydebugvaluemanager">WebAssemblyDebugValueManager</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Nullify DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LISTs instructions as a temporary measure before we implement DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LIST handling in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblydebugvaluemanager">WebAssemblyDebugValueManager</a>.

See <a href="https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/49705">https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/49705</a>. TODO Correctly handle DBG&#95;VALUE&#95;LISTs

<SectionDefinition>
